price: 42. ¿O quieren tramar algo (contra ti, Muhammad)? Mas los planes de quienes niegan la fe se volverán contra ellos.
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
